DOC.criteria: BMI ≥ 30 ≤ 47 Prohibited medication , supplement herbal product 1 . Use narcotic , oral injectable corticosteroid , multivitamin/multimineral supplement , antioxidant supplement , vitamin D supplement , probiotic omega3 fatty acid supplement 30 day prior screen duration study . 2 . Use prescription medication and/or nonprescription medication acute medical condition , semiacute medical condition , weight loss . 3 . Change prescription , OTC , nutritional supplement medical food within 30 day prior begin study duration study . Medical history concurrent diseases 1 . Known allergy hypersensitivity study product placebo . 2 . Clinically significant abnormality medical history physical examination . 3 . Clinically relevant condition expect preclude achievement exercise recommendation . 4 . Hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , respiratory , cardiovascular , endocrinologic , neurologic , immunologic , hematologic disease . 5 . Diabetes mellitus , irritable bowel syndrome , Gastroesophageal reflux disease , HIV , TB , hepatitis B C , malignancy , sleep apnea , insomnia ( require use sleep medication weekly ) , night eat syndrome , Anorexia nervosa , bulimia , nonspecific eat disorder , serious psychiatric illness . 6 . Smoking use nicotine containing product within 30 day prior screen duration study . 7 . Use drug abuse ( e.g . marijuana , cocaine , PCP , methamphetamine ) within 30 day prior screen duration study . Other criterion 1 . Initiation new change exist exercise regiment within 30 day prior screen . 2 . Initiation new change exist food plan within 30 day prior screen .
